meta.title: Swiss School Holidays (Schulferien Schweiz)
meta.description: Comprehensive Swiss school holiday data with cantonal and local variations

holiday_systems.centralized: Canton sets all dates uniformly for all schools
holiday_systems.hybrid: Canton sets some dates, locals set others (e.g., Sportferien)
holiday_systems.local: Each Gemeinde/school district sets own dates

AG.name: Aargau
AG.notes: 9 weeks cantonal uniform + 4 weeks local (Sportferien vary by Bezirk)

school_website.notes: Each Bezirk Hauptort has school website

holidays_cantonal.description: These dates apply to ALL 197 Gemeinden in Kanton Aargau

AI.name: Appenzell Innerrhoden
AI.notes: Oberegg has different dates than rest of canton

AR.name: Appenzell Ausserrhoden
AR.notes: Sportwoche variiert - dates set by local school authorities

BE.name: Bern
BE.notes: Sportwoche variiert; special rules for tourism municipalities and Biel region

GR.name: Graubünden
GR.notes: Autumn and Christmas holidays are cantonal. Other dates set by school authorities.

moesano.notes: Dates set by local school authorities

SG.name: St. Gallen
SG.notes: Sportwoche variiert - dates set by local school authorities

SZ.name: Schwyz
SZ.notes: Uniform start date and minimum duration; Sport and Summer may vary by 1 week

VS.name: Valais
VS.notes: Different dates for German and French regions; tourism municipalities have variations

ZH.name: Zürich
ZH.notes: 13 weeks total. School year start and Christmas holidays are cantonal. Other dates are recommendations - Gemeinden decide freely.

holidays_cantonal.description: Cantonal recommendations - dates may vary by Gemeinde

school_district.name: Schule RFT
school_district.notes: Shared school district - same holidays for all member Gemeinden

school_website.notes: Shared district - redirects to Schule RFT

historical_urls.notes: Dynamic download links - older PDFs may no longer be available
